biotools.summary: Linkprep create LINKAGE style .pre and .dat files from AGRF style data. This creates standard format input files for linkage analysis software from human genotyping data.

bioschemas.name: Linkprep
bioschemas.summary: Linkprep create LINKAGE style .pre and .dat files from AGRF style data. This creates standard format input files for linkage analysis software from human genotyping data.
